page.title: 07Health Care in Syston.
page.content: {OPTICIANS IN SYSTON There are 3 full-time opticians. They each see 12 patients a day for a 45 minute consultation. The most common sight defect is shortsightedness. The patients come from Syston and the nearby villages. { {DENTISTS IN SYSTON There are 6 dentists. Their patients come from all the villages as far as Melton Mowbray. Children under the age of 18 receive free treatment. 40% of all patients seen need treatment.{ { {SMOKING} A survey of 69 sets of parents of 7-8 year olds revealed that: 31 (44.9%) fathers smoke 14 (20.3%) mothers smoke
